projects.name: TechyDeals
projects.description: A fast and responsive e-commerce website designed to deliver a seamless shopping experience. Built with modern technologies, it features a user-friendly interface, secure checkout, product analytics, and an intuitive admin dashboard for effortless inventory and order management.

projects.name: OrbitBlog
projects.description: A sleek and modern blog platform built with the PERN stack and Next.js. Featuring dynamic CMS integration, advanced post analytics, admin notifications, it offers a seamless experience for content creators and readers alike.

projects.name: ThinkWrite
projects.description: A cloud-based document editor, which has a similar look and feel to Google Docs, that allows users to collaborate in real-time. With Instant document creation, editable docs & instant sharing to a clean UI, with no lagâ€”great for teams or individuals.
